title: [Admission] What are these details that we are supposed to fill (btech)
content:
After taking admission (submitting the original docs) I received this email from PES that says those who got admission into PES are required to fill details online at www.pesuacademy.com
I opened the website and signed in and can't find anything like this, btw I am an online counselling candidate

comments.body: This has been discussed previously. You can get the form to show up by using the app and navigating to student grievances. Search this sub for more details.

Thank you!!
I will do better research next time, sorry
